trans-unit.source: Provides a graphics buffer for double buffering.
trans-unit.target: 提供雙重緩衝的圖形緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphics class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: BufferedGraphics 類別可讓您實作自訂雙重緩衝的圖形。

trans-unit.source: It provides a wrapper for a graphics buffer, along with methods that you can use to write to the buffer and render its contents to an output device.
trans-unit.target: 它提供圖形緩衝區，以及可用來寫入緩衝區以及轉譯其內容至輸出裝置的方法包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: 使用雙重緩衝的圖形可以減少或消除閃爍因重繪顯示介面的。

trans-unit.source: When you use double buffering, updated graphics are first drawn to a buffer in memory, and the contents of this buffer are then quickly written to some or all of the displayed surface.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用雙重緩衝時，緩衝區在記憶體中，會先繪製更新的圖形和這個緩衝區的內容會接著快速寫入部分或所有顯示的介面。

trans-unit.source: This relatively brief overwrite of the displayed graphics typically reduces or eliminates the flicker that sometimes occurs when graphics are updated.
trans-unit.target: 顯示圖形這相當簡短覆寫通常會減少，或完全排除，有時會發生更新時，圖形會閃爍。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The simplest way to use double buffering is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> control style flag on a control using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 使用雙重緩衝的最簡單方式是設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>控制樣式旗標控制使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> flag for a control redirects all painting for the control through a default graphics buffer, without requiring any additional code.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>旗標的控制項將所有繪製控制項的預設圖形緩衝區中，透過重新都導向而不需要任何額外的程式碼。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: This flag is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定此旗標`true`預設。

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphics class has no public constructor and must be created by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for an application domain using its <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: BufferedGraphics 類別沒有公用建構函式，必須加以建立<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>應用程式網域使用其<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>目前應用程式定義域靜態<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Graphics%2A> property can be used for drawing to the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Graphics%2A>屬性可用於繪圖至圖形緩衝區。</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property provides access to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that draws to the graphics buffer allocated for this BufferedGraphics object.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性可存取<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>繪製至圖形緩衝區此 BufferedGraphics 物件所配置的物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A> method with no arguments draws the contents of the graphics buffer to the surface specified when the buffer was allocated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A>與任何引數繪製的圖形內容的緩衝區至介面方法可讓您指定當已配置的緩衝區。</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other overloads of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A> method allow you to specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object or an <xref:System.IntPtr> object that points to a device context to which to draw the contents of the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: 其他多載<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A>方法可讓您指定<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件或<xref:System.IntPtr>指向要繪製圖形緩衝區的內容的裝置內容物件。</xref:System.IntPtr> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about drawing double-buffered graphics, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需繪製雙重緩衝的圖形的詳細資訊，請參閱[雙重緩衝的圖形](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成時呼叫 Dispose 使用<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>中無法使用的狀態物件。</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>物件，以便記憶體回收行程可以回收的記憶體，<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>物件所佔用。</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之前您釋放最後一個參考<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並透過記憶體回收開始前執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that outputs to the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>輸出至圖形緩衝區的物件。

trans-unit.source: This property provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that draws to the graphics buffer allocated for this <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性提供<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>繪製至這個已配置的圖形緩衝區的物件<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that outputs to the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>輸出至圖形緩衝區的物件。

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the default device.
trans-unit.target: 將圖形緩衝區的內容寫入預設裝置。

trans-unit.source: This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device specified by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> used to create this <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會寫入圖形緩衝區的內容，藉由呼叫指定的裝置<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>用來建立此<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將圖形緩衝區的內容寫入指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將圖形緩衝區的內容寫入指定<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to which to write the contents of the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>寫入圖形緩衝區的內容物件。

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device context associated with the specified <xref:System.IntPtr> handle.
trans-unit.target: 將圖形緩衝區的內容寫入指定相關聯的裝置內容<xref:System.IntPtr>處理。</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device context associated with the specified <xref:System.IntPtr> handle.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將圖形緩衝區的內容寫入指定相關聯的裝置內容<xref:System.IntPtr>處理。</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> that points to the device context to which to write the contents of the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IntPtr>，以指到裝置內容，以供寫入圖形緩衝區的內容。</xref:System.IntPtr>
